Key Match Events: Asnawi Mangkualam scored the winning penalty in the 39th minute
Indonesia maintained a clean sheet throughout the match
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Shin Tae-Yong promised an attacking play before the match
Indonesia aimed to secure a better position in Group D to face Australia in the next round
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Shin Tae-Yong praised Asnawi Mangkualam's confidence and execution of the penalty
Hadi, a fan, expressed pride in the team's performance and excitement for the upcoming match against Japan
Miscellaneous Highlights: Indonesia's victory marked their first win since 2007 in the Asian Cup
Vietnam showed more determination in the second half but failed to score
